sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { User } from '../user/user'; import { UserService } from '../user/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'], }) export class FooterComponent implements OnInit { user$!: Observable; constructor(private userService: UserService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.user$ = this.userService.getUser(); } }
